full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DZAMBHA LA SER PO'I SGO NAS GTER BUM SGRUB TSUL DZAMBHA LA DKAR PO LA KHA BSGYUR TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI YONGS 'DZIN RDO RJE 'CHANG DAM TSIG RDO RJE GRAGS PA DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS, DZAMBHA LA SER PO'I SGO NAS GTER BUM SGRUB TSUL 'KHYER BDER BKOD PA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA ZHIG @018B MDZAD PA DE KHO NAS SOR BZHAG TU BYAS PA LAS MING DZAMBHA LA DKAR PO LA 'DON PA SPOS PAR TZAM MO, ,)
